sentences.en: Alongside the Job Creation Programme they launched a Work Experience Programme.
sentences.cn: 在开展创造就业项目的同时，他们还启动了工作经历项目。

sentences.en: Are we the only thinking species in the whole of creation?
sentences.cn: 我们是万物中惟一有思想的物种 吗 ?

sentences.en: He reiterated his opposition to the creation of a central bank.
sentences.cn: 他重申了自己反对成立央行的立场。

sentences.en: His re-creation of the city is credible, with a substratum of fact to bolster the fiction.
sentences.cn: 他对该城历史的再现是可信的，虚构的小说情节隐念着一些事实作为支撑。

sentences.en: I was full and effervescing with joy of creation.
sentences.cn: 由于创作的乐趣,我感到满足和欢欣.

sentences.en: Language is the most important mental creation of man.
sentences.cn: 语言是人类头脑最重要的产物.

sentences.en: Most countries have systems of government that are relatively modern creations.
sentences.cn: 大多数国家的政体都是比较现代的产物。

sentences.en: She finally found the perfect gown, a beautiful creation trimmed with lace.
sentences.cn: 她终于找到了理想的礼服——一袭饰有蕾丝的美丽长裙。

sentences.en: The bathroom is entirely my own creation.
sentences.cn: 浴室完全是由我设计的。

sentences.en: The creation of new playgrounds will benefit the local children.
sentences.cn: 新游戏场的建立将有益于当地的儿童.

sentences.en: The dress is a stunning creation in green, gold, and white.
sentences.cn: 这件礼服以绿色、金色和白色搭配，是绝妙的设计。

sentences.en: The manifesto gives pride of place to job creation.
sentences.cn: 这项宣言将创造工作机会放在首位。

sentences.en: The whale is the largest mammal in creation.
sentences.cn: 鲸鱼是所有哺乳动物中最大的.

sentences.en: The whale, like the dolphin, has become a symbol of the marvels of creation.
sentences.cn: 鲸和海豚一样，已经成为造物杰作的象征。

sentences.en: These businesses stimulate the creation of local jobs.
sentences.cn: 这些企业有助于为当地创造更多就业机会。

words.tran_cn: 特别创造说；创造宇宙说

phrases.tran_cn: 连续创造；不断创新；稳恒态宇宙论
[美国英语]到底，究竟[用于加强语气]

trans.tran_cn: (宗教)创世，创造作品，天地万物
